## Description {#details}

A simple and fast domtree-based CSE pass.

This pass does a simple depth-first walk over the dominator tree, eliminating trivially redundant instructions and using instsimplify to canonicalize things as it goes. It is intended to be fast and catch obvious cases so that instcombine and other passes are more effective. It is expected that a later pass of GVN will catch the interesting/hard cases.

Definition at line 641 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp">EarlyCSE.cpp</a>.

### isOperatingOnInvariantMemAt() {#a1d7c968d6ff2cb78fe0914b0bd8dc095}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool EarlyCSE::isOperatingOnInvariantMemAt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, unsigned GenAt)</>}>
Return true if the instruction is known to only operate on memory provably invariant in the given &quot;generation&quot;.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp/#l00992">992</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp">EarlyCSE.cpp</a>.

### isSameMemGeneration() {#af225faa19e70288baea91dd678ad0fcd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool EarlyCSE::isSameMemGeneration (unsigned EarlierGeneration, unsigned LaterGeneration, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; EarlierInst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; LaterInst)</>}>
Determine if the memory referenced by LaterInst is from the same heap version as EarlierInst.

This is currently called in two scenarios:

load p ... load p

and

x = load p ... store x, p

in both cases we want to verify that there are no possible writes to the memory referenced by p between the earlier and later instruction.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp/#l00994">994</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp">EarlyCSE.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### AvailableValues {#a1fdc6655978cda56c76b557d6d4d81e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ScopedHTType anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;EarlyCSE.cpp&#125;::EarlyCSE::AvailableValues</>}>
A scoped hash table of the current values of all of our simple scalar expressions.

As we walk down the domtree, we look to see if instructions are in this: if so, we replace them with what we find, otherwise we insert them so that dominated values can succeed in their lookup.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp/#l00664">664</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/earlycse-cpp">EarlyCSE.cpp</a>.
